title: avarAga varuvArO varamATTAr
sahitya:
avarAga varuvArO varamATTAr idil atishayamennaDi annamE kaNNan


anupallavi

  evarukkum mElAna innaruLALan yamunAvanam pUtta ina malart-tALan bhuvanam 
mayakkum pullAn-kuzhalishaiyALan puNNiyam mighunda engaL rAdhai maNavALan
		(madhyamakAlam)
tavamirunda kALiyan talaimishai irundu tANDavamADiya padam koNDu 
tamAla mara nizhal irundu enniDam taniyAgap-pEshi adai ninaivu koNDu 
kuvaLai nIlat-tirumEni koNDanru gOvardanam shumandadu pOla inru 
kuvalaya muzhuduLa kavalaiyai orungu koNDu varangirundu nErAga


caraNam    tUdu shenra undan vAyADittanam kaNDu tollai enreNNi viTTArO 
nAdak-kuzhalishaiyil nava navamAga nAdam iNaittu viTTArO 
Adavan anji kuLirndu ninru AnandamAga ninaindArO 
aDiyEnaiyum shairandri pOlavE eNNi AgaTTum enru viTTArO
